tool.name: Extract result to database
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/mlst_extract_table.py -o '$output' -e $export_result.export #if str($mincover) -m $mincover #end if #if $keep -k #end if #if $inverse -V #end if #if $duplicate -d #end if #if $export_result.export == "strain" #if $export_result.count -c #end if #end if '$database' 2> /dev/null

param.name: export
param.label: Select the data export
param.option: Distance matrix between strains on the wgMLST database
List of the strains on the wgMLST database
List of the genes on the wgMLST database

param.name: count
param.label: Report the number of gene found for each strain

param.name: mincover
param.label: Minimun number of strain found to conserved a gene

param.name: keep
param.label: Keep only gene with different allele

param.name: inverse
param.label: Conserved only gene that not pass filter of mincover or keep options

tool.help:
**What it does**
Extract result from an wgMLST database.
